title: Update on US Growth and Earnings Forecasts, and Expected Stimulus Programs
description: Goldman Sachs’ top economists and strategists discuss revised forecasts for the US economy and corporate earnings and the prospect of federal stimulus programs in the face of the COVID-19 outbreak.
itunes:author: Goldman Sachs
itunes:summary: Goldman Sachs’ top economists and strategists discuss revised forecasts for the US economy and corporate earnings and the prospect of federal stimulus programs in the face of the COVID-19 outbreak.
